divs: Sighting Detailswe saw a glowing orb of light travelling at approx 50-60 mph at a height of no more than 200 feet, it travelled in a straight line without changing velocity or direction, it could not have been more than 10 feet in diameter.It was totally silent and glowed a bright orange colour, we saw it for between 2 and 3 minutes.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Norwich
There were no other sightings in Norwich on or around August 11th 2009
